short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A keyboard based window organizer for ChromeOS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can use Quadrilateral to assign a keyboard shortcut to resize a ChromeOS window to 1/6, 1/4, 1/3, 2/3, or 1/2 of the screen and move the resized window to a fixed position (e.g. the top left 1/6th or right 1/3rd of the screen).
